name: hri-bot
description: This bot was made by Hri7566. The original base source was written by BopItFreak for use with JAMB and his unofficial fishing bot. It is a rewrite of a rewrite of a rewrite of the original 7566 bot, which was a duplicate of Karl Marx's MarxBot. Never forget that a growing community is the future, and the future starts with you.
author: Hri7566
